title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5009.5 - Rights of a member with a date of membership on or after January 1, 2010, who has vested
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5009.5 - Rights of a member with a date of membership on or after January 1, 2010, who has vested

State Regulations
(a) A member
who has 10 or more years of credited service on termination of employment shall
be automatically vested and shall be entitled to a deferred vested benefit at
retirement age in accordance with the provisions of sections
603
and
604
of the Retirement and Social Security

Law. (b) In no event shall the
vested retirement allowance payable without optional modification be less than
the actuarial equivalent of the total which results from the member's
contributions accumulated with interest at five percent per annum compounded
annually to the date of retirement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5009.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
